translated: “See this body, Nandā, diseased, impure, stinking,

analyzed: ekaggam su samāhita  yathā idam tathā eta
translated: one-pointed, well-concentrated.🔽As this is, so is that;
as that is, so is this.
I penetrated to the knowledge of the truth.”
I saw this body as it really is,
Then I became disenchanted with the body,
I am peaceful, I am quenched.”
